resources.string: Kindly complete this feedback form to inform CDNetNG and others how you have benefited from the iCeeTech Initiative
Please ensure that your internet connection is active and then try again in few minutes. Thank You!
An error has occurred. Please try again in few minutes. Thank You!
An active Internet connection is required to access the server. Please enable Mobile data or try again in few minutes.

iXTech is a mobile application that allows participants of the I Cee Tech event share their experiences, connect and get sponsored news from the organizers, CDNet. You can pin posts, read news, connect via email and have fun
